title: What do the colors of the icons in the "Connected devices" list correspond to on the Pixel 4 XL?
content:
On the screen for Connected devices (Settings --> Connected devices) on my Pixel 4 XL, there are icons next to each device name with symbols and the colors: Green, Yellow, Orange (darker yellow), and Red. Does anyone know what the colors correspond to in relation to the connected device?

There doesn't seem to be a correlation between the icon and color or device type and color. However, my devices with red icons never show up in the top "Previously Connected Devices" list without clicking "> See all."
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
